Title: Relates to requiring the department of labor to conduct a study on the potential impact of driverless vehicles
Summary: Requires the department of labor to conduct a study on the potential impact of driverless vehicles on occupations and employment.
ActClause: AN ACT requiring the department of labor to conduct a study to determine and report on the potential impact of driverless vehicles on occupations and employment and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
